snippet.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator Accolades Trailer
snippet.description:
Microsoft Flight Simulator is the critically acclaimed next generation of one of the most beloved flight simulation franchises. Fly anywhere on the planet in highly detailed and accurate aircrafts from light planes to wide-body jets. Test your piloting skills against the challenges of real-time atmospheric simulation and live weather in a dynamic and living world. The world is at your fingertips. 

Available Now.

https://www.xbox.com/games/microsoft-flight-simulator

AUDIO DESCRIPTION: https://youtu.be/4xv6DN6zbz0
